content: I think there may have been a recent change which has broken main. I can't compile some of my previous AoC apps using cli-platform or even the most simple app I can make, and cargo test also fails to complete. The common error message I get it thread '<unnamed>' panicked at 'not yet implemented: top-level destrucuture patterns are not implemented', crates/compiler/load_internal/src/file.rs:5185:26. I'll log an issue, but just wondering if anyone else is seeing this problem? I'm not sure how to help track down the issue, but I'll try and find it.
Luke Boswell has marked this topic as resolved.
Pretty sure this is a False alarm, I think I found another compiler bug.
